long_description: Go for the casual, low-maintenance style of The North Face Aloona dress. Layer this soft, cotton blend sweater-knit dress over leggings paired with your favorite boots for smart, comfortable style. Cotton, polyester and modal blend creates a lightweight sweater knit with a subtle yarn-dyed stripe pattern; it offers soft, breathable comfort. The North Face Aloona dress has a relaxed boat neckline, raglan sleeves and wide cuffs and hem.
short_description: Go for the casual, low-maintenance style of The North Face Aloona dress. Layer this soft, cotton blend sweater-knit dress over leggings paired with your favorite boots for smart, comfortable style.
